subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Al Howard drives the horse ambulance at the New York Racing Association tracks and is part of the team that works to administer to horses when they are injured in a race.  For him, the best days are when no horses are injured.
